snippet: The markets started November on a strong note as a report showed that American manufacturing had expanded in October.
abstract: Stock markets start November on a strong note as investors react to report showing that American manufacturing expanded in October.
lead_paragraph: The markets started November on a strong note as a report showed that American manufacturing had expanded in October.

headline.main: News on Output Gives November a Good Start
headline.print_headline: News on Output Gives November a Good Start
